{"id":531501394,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1627808182,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/531501394/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char, int> m;\n        \n        int l = 0;\n        int len = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++)\n        {\n            if(m.find(s[i]) != m.end())\n                l = max(l, m[s[i]] + 1);\n            m[s[i]] = i;            \n            len = max(len, i - l + 1);\n        }\n        \n        return len;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
